name: logforge
description: LogForge is a lightweight and fast self-hosted log management service that provides real-time monitoring and querying of application logs through a modern web UI. It integrates easily with Docker and cloud-native environments.
features: Log Management: Real-time monitoring, Query logs, Modern web UI. Lightweight log aggregation.
Docker Integration: Container logs, Easy setup, Cloud-native. Perfect for containerized apps.
Fast Performance: Efficient storage, Quick queries, Low overhead. Handle logs without slowdown.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your log data.
Real-Time Streaming: Live log tailing, Instant updates, WebSocket support. Monitor logs as they arrive.
Query Language: Powerful filtering, Pattern matching, Aggregations. Find what you need.
Alerting: Custom alerts, Notification channels, Threshold monitoring. Stay informed of issues.
Multi-Source: Collect from anywhere, Unified view, Centralized logging. Aggregate all your logs.
